Detailed Description

An AbsSeekBar is an extension of ProgressBar.

Its subclasses are SeekBar and RatingBar.

The following example demonstrates how to use the AbsSeekBar

 //We can't initialize AbsSeekBar object.
 //But we can initialize its subclasses (ex:SeekBar) to use its APIs.
 gaia::ui::SeekBar* mpSeekBar = new gaia::ui::SeekBar(static_cast<Page*>(this));

 //use AbsSeekBar API
 mpSeekBar->setMax(50);

Definition at line 39 of file AbsSeekBar.h.
